short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Insights for your Bluesky activities and engagements

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bluesky analytics tool that helps you learn about your activities

Features:
- View tweet replies
- View profile's best tweets
- Share beautiful charts and create poster, with 16 different styles
- Search with instant results and shortcuts
- Overview graphs: Activity Frequency, Activity Impressions, Activities for Tweets/Replies/Retweets, Engagement for Likes/Retweets/Replies/Bookmark
- Tweets/Replies table: See all of your tweets and reply to other tweets in table format
- Click an item on the Frequency graph to see activities
- Added Reply to your posts tab
- Display as sidebar
- Dark/dim/light mode
- View other profiles

Like Bluesky Analytics? Leave your review. Your support is highly appreciated.
